issue.title: [CF 1316] TellMeWhen attempted to call a protected function (ActionButton3:Hide())
issue.body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
error sometimes appears in combat

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? 8.12

Do you have an error log of what happened?

``` Date: 2016-10-15 21:38:16 ID: 1 Error occured in: AddOn: TellMeWhen Count: 1 Message: Note: AddOn TellMeWhen attempted to call a protected function (ActionButton3:Hide()) during combat lockdown. Debug: [C]: Hide() ..\FrameXML\ActionButton.lua:320: ActionButton_Update() ..\FrameXML\ActionButton.lua:276: ActionButton_UpdateAction() ..\FrameXML\ActionBarController.lua:135: ActionBarController_UpdateAll() ..\FrameXML\ActionBarController.lua:64: ..\FrameXML\ActionBarController.lua:53 Locals: None AddOns: BlizzBugsSuck, v7.0.3.1 InspectFix, v4.5.2 Swatter, v7.2.5678 (TasmanianThylacine) WowheadLooter, v60014 AdvancedInterfaceOptions, v1.0.5 Altoholic, vr171 AtlasLoot, vv8.01.04 Auctionator, v4.0.13 AuctionLite, v1.8.16 AuctionLiteAdvSearch, v1.5 Auditor2, v5.0.4
